argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elin | |- ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) <-> ( T e. LinFn /\ T e. ConFn ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( T = if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) -> ( normfn ` T ) = ( normfn ` if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( T = if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) -> ( ( normfn ` T ) e. RR <-> ( normfn ` if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) ) e. RR ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_0lnfn | |- ( ~H X. { 0 } ) e. LinFn |
| 5 |  | #P_0cnfn | |- ( ~H X. { 0 } ) e. ConFn |
| 6 |  | #P_elin | |- ( ( ~H X. { 0 } ) e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) <-> ( ( ~H X. { 0 } ) e. LinFn /\ ( ~H X. { 0 } ) e. ConFn ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_mpbir2an | |- ( ~H X. { 0 } ) e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_elimel | |- if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) |
| 9 |  | #P_elin | |- ( if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) <-> ( if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) e. LinFn /\ if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) e. ConFn ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_mpbi | |- ( if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) e. LinFn /\ if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) e. ConFn ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_simpli | |- if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) e. LinFn |
| 12 | 10 | #P_simpri | |- if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) e. ConFn |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_nmcfnexi | |- ( normfn ` if ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) , T , ( ~H X. { 0 } ) ) ) e. RR |
| 14 | 3, 13 | #P_dedth | |- ( T e. ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) -> ( normfn ` T ) e. RR ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_sylbir | |- ( ( T e. LinFn /\ T e. ConFn ) -> ( normfn ` T ) e. RR ) |
